Antisipasi Desa Fiktif, Kemendes PDTT Dorong Dilakukannya Verifikasi Desa di Seluruh RI
07 Nov 2019, 18:29 by Donny Nur Arbayanto



Antisipasi Desa Fiktif, Kemendes PDTT Dorong Dilakukannya Verifikasi Desa di Seluruh RI



Antisipasi Desa Fiktif, Kemendes PDTT Dorong Dilakukannya Verifikasi Desa di Seluruh RI



Antisipasi Desa Fiktif, Kemendes PDTT Dorong Dilakukannya Verifikasi Desa di Seluruh RI


KBRN, semarang : Dugaan adanya beberapa desa fiktif di wilayah Provinsi Sulawesi Tenggara sebagaimana diberitakan sejumlah media akhir-akhir ini, Kementrian Desa Pembangunan Daerah Tertinggal dan Transmigrasi (Kemendes PDTT) mendorong agar dilakukan verifikasi desa di seluruh wilayah Republik Indonesia. 
"Ada 15 desa yang diduga fiktif dan tersebar di beberapa provinsi. Kebanyakan berada di Luar Jawa.  Harapannya, ke depan, tidak ada desa fiktif, terlebih di Kabupaten Pekalongan,” tutur Wamendes PDTT, Budi Arie Setiadi saat meninjau Desa Mulyorejo, Kecamatan Tirto, Kabupaten Pekalongan, Kamis (07/11/2019).
Untuk mengantisipasi adanya desa fiktif, menurutnya, sekarang ini ada sistem keuangan desa yang transparan.
“Sistem yang transparan, semuanya terukur, terpantau,” imbuh wamen.
Pengawasan dana desa, menurut Budi Arie Setiadi, harus berbasis pada keterlibatan masyarakat.
“Masyarakat harus mengawasi penggunaan dana desa. Rakyat sekarang sudah cerdas, semua sudah transparan,“ ujarnya.
Dari hasil perjalanannya meninjau beberapa daerah, pihaknya melihat dana desa secara umum memberi manfaat bagi kemajuan desa.
“Jika masih ada persoalan, maka harus kita benahi bersama,” tegasnya.
Lebih lanjut wamen mengutarakan, pembangunan dan keadilan sosial harus menyentuh seluruh masyarakat Indonesia. Namun kondisi APBN yang terbatas, menurut wamen, perlu dicari sumber lain dan perlu keterlibatan berbagai pihak dalam pembangunan. 
Plt. Kepala Desa Mulyorejo dalam kesempatan tersebut menyampaikan permasalahan yang dihadapi desanya yang memiliki luas wilayah 72,38 hektare. Permasalahan tersebut yakni adanya genangan air rob yang semakin tahun semakin meningkat debit airnya.
"Air rob Mulyorejo bermula dari tahun 2006 sampai sekarang. Terakhir kondisi di wilayah ini, pada Bulan Januari 2019 genangan air tinggi sekali. Dalam kurun waktu 2015-2019 rob mengalami kenaikan sekitar 31 %,” ungkap Plt Kades Mulyorejo. 
Wakil Bupati Pekalongan Ir. Hj. Arini Harimurti dalam sambutan saat menerima kunjungan rombongan Wamendes PDTT menyatakan terima kasih atas kunjungan Wamen, karena, menurutnya, dengan kunjungan ini, pihak kementrian bisa melihat langsung kondisi Kabupaten Pekalongan khususnya Desa Mulyorejo.
Harapannya, dengan adanya kegiatan ini, maka program- program dari Pusat dapat bersinergi dengan program-progam dari Daerah.
”Kami harapkan nanti ada sinergitas, apa yang akan dilakukan pemkab, apa yang diprogramkan desa, apa yang diprogramkan Pusat, termasuk tidak hanya dana-dana pemerintah, barangkali dana-dana dari swasta, apakah itu dari CSR, atau yang  lain, nanti bisa kita sinergikan,” tutur Arini.
Menurut Arini, desa adalah produsen kehidupan, produsen pangan, apakah itu padi, paternakan, mungkin perikanan.
Desa juga menjadi produsen oksigen yang baik. Oleh karena itu, lanjutnya, apabila desa dikelola dengan tepat, maka tentu saja pembangunan menjadi seimbang antara desa dengan kota maupun Pemerintah Pusat.
"Oleh karena itu,  harapan kami pembangunan desa ini, hendaknya betul-betul tepat sesuai kebutuhan dan kondisi lingkungan yang riil,"  ungkap Arini. 
Dalam kegiatan kunjungan Wamen  tersebut tampak hadir Kepala Dinas PMD PPPA kab Pekalongan, M. Afib S Sos, Camat Tirto beserta unsur forkopimcam, unsur pemerintah dan non pemerintah serta masyarakat Desa Mulyorejo.

Anticipating Fictitious Villages, Ministry of PDTT Encourages Village Verification Throughout RI
Nov 7 2019, 18:29 by Donny Nur Arbayanto



Anticipating Fictitious Villages, Ministry of PDTT Encourages Village Verification Throughout RI



Anticipating Fictitious Villages, Ministry of PDTT Encourages Village Verification Throughout RI



Anticipating Fictitious Villages, Ministry of PDTT Encourages Village Verification Throughout RI


KBRN, semarang: Allegedly there are some fictitious villages in the area of Southeast Sulawesi Province as reported by a number of media lately, the Ministry of Rural Development and Transmigration (Ministry of PDTT) encourages village verification throughout the territory of the Republic of Indonesia.
"There are 15 villages suspected of being fictitious and scattered in several provinces. Most are outside Java. Hopefully, in the future, there are no fictitious villages, especially in Pekalongan Regency," said Vice-Minister of PDTT, Budi Arie Setiadi when observing Mulyorejo Village, Tirto District, Pekalongan Regency, Thursday (11/07/2019).
To anticipate the existence of a fictitious village, according to him, there is now a transparent village financial system.
"A transparent system, everything is measured, monitored," added the deputy.
Supervision of village funds, according to Budi Arie Setiadi, must be based on community involvement.
"The community must oversee the use of village funds. People are now smart, everything is transparent, "he said.
From the results of his trip to visit several regions, his party saw that village funds generally benefited the village's progress.
"If there are still problems, then we must fix it together," he said.
Furthermore, the Vice Minister stated, development and social justice must touch all Indonesian people. However, the limited state budget conditions, according to the Vice Minister, other sources need to be sought and the involvement of various parties in development is needed.
Plt. The Head of Mulyorejo Village on the occasion conveyed the problems faced by his village which has an area of 72.38 hectares. The problem is that there is a pool of tidal water which is increasingly increasing its water discharge.
"Mulyorejo's rob water began in 2006 until now. The last condition in this region, in January 2019, the inundation was very high. During the period of 2015-2019 the rob experienced an increase of about 31%," said Acting Head of the Mulyorejo village.
Deputy Regent of Pekalongan Ir. Hj. Arini Harimurti in his speech when receiving a visit from the Vice Minister of Vice PDTT expressed his gratitude for the visit of the Vice Minister, because, according to him, with this visit, the ministry could see firsthand the condition of the Pekalongan Regency especially the Mulyorejo Village.
Hopefully, with this activity, programs from the Center can work in synergy with programs from the regions.
"We hope that there will be synergy, what will the district government do, what is programmed by the village, what is planned by the Center, including not only government funds, perhaps funds from the private sector, whether it is from CSR, or else, we can later synergize, "said Arini.
According to Arini, the village is a producer of life, a producer of food, whether it is rice, paternakan, maybe fisheries.
The village is also a good producer of oxygen. Therefore, he continued, if the village is managed appropriately, then of course development will be balanced between the village and the city and the Central Government.
"Therefore, our hope is that the development of this village, should really be right according to the needs and real environmental conditions," said Arini.
During the Wamen's visit the Head of the PPPA PMD Office, Pekalongan District, M. Afib S Sos, Tirto Sub-District Head and forkopimcam elements, government and non-government elements and the people of Mulyorejo Village.
